comments.body: Too many ideas in one tbh, honestly thinking more along the lines of how nether fortresses are laid out just with a more end like vibe, being the parkour and so on, def would love a shulker spawner to be a thing though
Now for end archaeology...
dang you really like shulkers
They can spawn often around undead mobs and witches, like familiars and because they eat carrion
It could also spawn in outposts as a wooden statue, but to give a golem the totem of undying, you must first give it bamboo.
Great idea but to make it better I think you should ask to add jungle villages to go with the bamboo golem
El golen de bambu solo seria un mods pasivo invocable para ayudar a los aldenos

Why on earth would bastions and nether fortresses have horse armor when there's no horses in the nether...

I mean, I love the Idea,(I upvoted it) but idk why fortresses already have stuff like golden horse armor and the like
There are many such posts. Please vote for past feedback on Netherite Horse Armor.
Adorable. Reminds me of a Minecraft music parody I watched long ago lol
We need this I would tame thousands and put them in my friends house
Maybe it explodes a little more than one block...  It definitely should explode faster

I only support thee partly. I agree to thine first part, but not entirely the last part. 

As we agree to, the mob added to the game is the singel species Dromedary, wich is in the family of camels. The mob represents a Dromedary in every way except the name.

A Bactrian camel has darker longer fur, has two humps and lives in cold climates, as we know.

I do agree to thine last part as long as it makes sense. We do know about different colours, shapes and patterns on horses, but all that is only races and breeding contained inside a singel species; horse. We also know that a donkey are a different mob in the game, since it is a different species. And the mule is a third mob, because a mule is not a donkey, and a mule is not a horse.

 

I have not seen much of races and/or different variations of colour or patterns of dromedarys, but it may actually be a reall thing.
I'd like to see an elasmotherium. Especially the albino ones.
plantas prehistoricas seria mejor
Maybe make a new mob with inspiration with real dinosaurs and ice age beast
The desert doesn't have much stuff in the game. Adding desert Oases would be really cool!
picking which book could be as simple as aiming your mouse at it
we need more of these and the mossy nether blocks being warped or crimson covered is sweet
we definitely need this in Minecraft!
yes we need this it would be cool for treasure hunts
That sounds like a great idea! Maybe the deer could also have cherry blossoms on there horns or something to make it feel like it really belongs there :)

I need a capy Bara too that can be eat watermelon and it spawns in the jungle because that's where water melon spawns

I think that this should be added back, because copper should get as many uses as possible. Iron ingots will have 36 crafting recipes when 1.21 roll out, and currently, copper will have nine crafting recipes when 1.21 comes out. Anything to make copper more useful/have a use.
Maybe it could be another variant? Having to always dig wouldn't be that enjoyable

Retributin, Your idea sounds GREAT! I should've thought about that.

(I am not trying to be sarcastic or mean.)
Maybe it would be better to have a chance of suspicious gravel instead of removing a chest because even in the beginning of a world players could get some loot.
also if you have to use a brush the ruined nether portals would be useless early game
freiggisfrey, that is a great concern, but doesn't the loot not be the best already? If they had better loot, it would be more worthwhile to have chests.
But spiders don't have bones. It must be an animated pile of various bones, which has taken the form of a spider, the skull must be human, the body from a human chest.
there was such a mob in Minecraft Earth.
No itd too powerful it would not be a good idea
It wasn't good idea. Plz don't add it to minecraft 1.20! Everyone won't survive this in both hardcore and survival. So, someone try to defeat them, they could die. Impossible to defeat the watcher!
Just don't hit

This sounds like a good idea. Perhaps you could bribe it with an item to get it to tell any wardens in a certain radius that you are somewhere you aren't. It would make for a good last ditch effort for hardcore players.
Like it, but how about it doesn't say exactly where you are to the warden
It would be better if it only was a little chance that a warden would spawn

It would be more interesting if there was some reason to hit it, though...

but that doesn't have to be hostility, it could be something interesting like the mob puts out/breaks torches and/or candles, which could also add unlit torches for decoration and a better reason to use lanterns. 

It would also be more interesting if it weren't for the fact that the warden is very good at finding things despite it's blindness... (It acts like it can see you once it is angry at you...) having something work with the warden to keep it just as threatening while also nerfing it so that it feels more blind!

I think that this is advanced functionality, by the way, the toolkit is already embedded in your PC.
You simply copy all the resources of the game to the archive of your resource pack, but remove the new music from it.
It may sound like a difficult, but you should try it once.
They're definitely not doing that.

Straight up the ability to personalize and adjust the in-game music playlist in vanilla would be amazing. After all, the only part of it, that is by design is the music being intersperced with stretches of silence and only certain tracks playing in certain dimensions. The rest is purely random, so it would be very much appreciated to get some control over this randomness.
You could just find more discs? What's the point of this change?
We need that! Lena's music is cool, but C418 is just amazing. Sometimes i like listening to Lena Raines, but it would be cool if you could adjust how frequently each musicians music played
Great idea I mean it is called the torch flower I play on Minecraft bedrock so can‚Äôt see it yet though but still amazing idea
I'm not really sure what you mean by "arson mechanic with reload", but making is glow (maybe on the level of soul torches?) would be cool.
A surcoat made of a banner that slightly protects from freezing in powdered snow and can be enchanted, but quickly burns and tears.
We need a cape maker
They already added capes
I‚Äôd rather not have a water bar, also, that idea is certified declined. The other ideas are great tho! Cherry blossoms are actually being added!

This is great except for the fact that bears would not be added as all hostile mobs must be fantasy and water bar has already been certified declined as hunger bar and hunger mechanics are all the Minecraft team wants work on.

I got a similar idea, I call the Great Outdoors Update! A grappling hook would also be a nice addition to be able to climb mountains more easily, add Zip-lines into the game too! A sleeping bag made with three leather in a row, a tent could be made with seven leather and a sleeping bag, add deer; both Stag and Doe. They can drop Venison, Leather or Antlers! Add Marshmallows and Hot Dogs too!

As a note to the previous comment... Panda bears. Polar bears. Why not regular bears? Also, fun fact, Polar bears hunt humans in real life. They are one of the very few animals that actively hunts human beings... and they are a neutral mob... So why not regular bears?

I would like to see a carpet of leaves. This is a great fire starter for a stove, a good way to hide a base or a trap.
It would also be interesting if you could use shears to remove the leaves and what's left are dead leaves or branch blocks.
I would rather have it more lime colored.
i agree
The biome already has a special grass color and blossom petal carpets.
It should be green for better contrast. Matched colours is too muddy/blended.
We need more crops, so I'm down.

I just had a similar idea.  Like a flower pot, but it's a weird-shaped item similar to paintings.

Super cool idea, I would only suggest that the Warden is meant to be a more difficult boss. So I think having the candle help you sneak is pretty cool, but having it all over makes the Warden to easy.

I would suggest, make it a semi-rare (but not too rare) item you have to find in the chests in the ancient city. So you take out your first Warden and it's as hard as its meant to be, but then you have say a 1/4 chance of finding a candle in a chest if you were to look in 4 chests.

Making it slightly easier to get around and finish off the next few Wardens. Just a suggestion to add on to yours.
I don't like the part about making it easier, but it would be a nice addition, more soulfire blocks are always welcome
They should just be decorative.
